newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Bank Negara 91-day bills average yield 6.382 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bank Negara 91-day bills average yield 6.382 pct.

text.p: Malaysia's central bank said it accepted bids at an average yield of 6.382 percent at its auction of 91-day Bank Negara bills for 500 million ringgit.
At its previous auction on March 25 for a similar amount, Bank Negara accepted bids at an average yield of 6.353 percent.
The bids accepted were in the high/low range of 6.399/364 percent against 6.361/335 percent last week.
The central bank said it also accepted bids for 30-day Bank Negara bills for 500 million ringgit, at an average yield of 6.384 percent against 6.323 last week.
The bids accepted were in the high/low range of 6.400/351 percent against 6.349/289.
Payment for both issues is on Wednesday.
The issues would be partly financed by the maturity of 500 million ringgit in Bank Negara bills on Friday.
